mapper.insert: insert into record(user_id, username, problem_id, contest_id, problem_number, submit_time, code_length, submit_language, personal) values (#{userId}, #{username}, #{problemId}, #{contestId}, #{problemNumber}, #{submitTime}, #{codeLength}, #{submitLanguage}, #{personal})
mapper.update: update record set test_amount=#{testAmount}, accepted_test_amount=0 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from record where judge_result = #{judgeResult} order by id
